## \_Promise.delay property

Returns a `Promise` which will resolve to `resolveWith` after a delay of `delay` (in milliseconds).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static readonly delay: typeof promiseDelay;
```

## Remarks

See [promiseDelay()](./rc-js-util.promisedelay.md)<!-- -->.
